.. _topology:

#############################
Topology Generation
#############################

DAVE_core provides functions for generating energy network models, with each network level generated by its own function.

The following network topologies are covered from DAVE:

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1

    topology/extra_high_voltage
    topology/high_voltage
    topology/medium_voltage
    topology/low_voltage
    topology/high_pressure
